util

Class YoutubeAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.YoutubeAPI

  • public class YoutubeAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    this class represents youtube Data Api3 client that can request youtube services like search,video list, etc..
    Author:
    Hussein
